info.title: Recorded Future
info.description: Recorded Future Connector enables access to the Recorded Future Intelligence. The connector has dedicated actions for pulling Recorded Future indicators (IP, Domain, URL, Hash) and associated context (Risk Score, Risk Rules, Intelligence Card Link and Related Entities) , Vulnerabilities, Recorded Future Alerts and enables access to Recorded Future SOAR API and Fusion Files
